content: I just got a notice from EHI about a task force:

This Week's Task Force Meeting

FHIR® Communications Task Force
﻿August 15
2:00 - 3:00 pm ET﻿
RSVP

Join us for eHI's August FHIR® Communications Task Force Meeting

Tomorrow we continue the review and editing process on the HL7® FHIR® FAQ document, targeting provider audiences. We appreciate the time and effort it takes to translate such a complex topic into language for a non-technical audience and hope you will join us!

Tomorrow's discussion includes additional questions and content that have been added since the July meeting
It is not too late to join the process
For a copy of the FAQs that will be discussed, reply back to this email

All eHI members are encouraged to participate in the important work of this task force and to invite any colleagues at your organization who might be interested.

For more information on each workgroup, click on the links above or contact Claudia Ellison. Visit our event page to see more upcoming workgroup meetings and our 2019 Member Task Force page for more information on the task forces.
does anyone know anyone associated with this?
I'm doing some work (through HL7) with the ONC on some '1 pagers' - not sure if this is the same...
